Articles.Content: You ascend to level 131, only to find an idiot facing a crowd. Fearlessly, you ask his what he\'s doing there.
He falls out the window. Now you\'re the idiot facing the crowd.
Although you \'fell\' to level 132. Weird.
on level 131 you see a n1 blowing up
On level 133 you find a 7.
You proceed to level 134 and find the Spytech secret experimentation area. You are kicked out of the window and crash back down into floor...

28

Only one floor at a time.
On floor 135 you see a window. outside of it you see Bill, Jeb and Bob in a rocket, spiraling out of control.

A sniper appears in your hands. You aim, and shoot Jebidiah in the head.

'HEADSHOT!'

The rocket crashes.

You quickly proceed to floor 130. There you see....
...floor 129. You don\'t know how the stairs took you up and down at the same time.
You go down to floor 128 and find discord, out of his stone prison. He is about to squash you. YOU QUICKLY AND CARELESSLY PROCEED TO FLOOR ___ AND ON THE WAY YOU TRIP AND FALL DOWN TO FLOOR ___
You go to floor 130. You see Jebadiah\'s new rocket, so you run for your life up to floor 131.
Which Jeb EVAd up to. You run off to floor 132.
But you trip and fall down a floor onto a balcony. That Jeb\'s rocket is taking off from.

You run back up to 123.

You find Ã¡+?Ã­Ã­?Ã½Ã¡Ã½Å¡Å¡Å¡===%.
You go down to floor 122 and find a giant statue of a chicken with red eyes on the launchpad. You wonder how come there is a launchpad built into this tower.
You ascend once more to floor 124, where a window overlooks floor e.
Feeling down, you go back to Floor 123, where you find a child's counting blocks. Interesting. Very.

You return to floor 122, where you find the child's mother crying and lying in a puddle of mustard and cheese. You tell her that the child is upstairs and she runs away screaming. You take some mustard covered cheese and awkwardly walk to...

...floor 121, where you find the child, he asks you why no one is playing this game anymore.

(He is glad you mis-guided his mother. I mean, she was obviously ducking crazy.)
You kick the child over, and ascend to floor 124, where you find a television and a DVD player with the "Apollo 18" movie on it.

(you can only go up and down one floor)

You insert the mustard and cheese into the DVD player and sneak the Apollo 18 movie into your shirt, before going to floor...
123, where an old man motivates you to head on all the way down to floor 1. So you begin your adventure back to the start.
